articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Ireland
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Ireland
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Micheal Higgins, president of the Republic of Ireland, on Sunday on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed the belief that the bilateral cooperative ties would develop in the common interests and desire of the two peoples.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages to Senior Chinese Officials
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages to Senior Chinese Officials
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a congratulatory message to Li Keqiang upon his appointment as premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China at the 1st session of the 12th Chinese National People's Congress on Friday.
					 The message wished for a success in his work, confirming the belief that the Chinese people would make an excellent progress in their efforts to ensure the durable and rapid economic development and increase the overall national might, and that the traditional DPRK-China relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger by the common efforts of both sides.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a similar message to Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi upon his appointment on Saturday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Jang Jae On Samuel, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Catholics Association, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio upon his election as the 266th Pope by the blessings of the Lord and the deep confidence of the Catholic Church in the cardinal.
					 The message wished the cardinal, the Vicar of Christ on earth, positive success in the pastoral work for development of the Catholic Church and to realize love, peace and justice.

articles.title: DFRK Sends Appeal to All Koreans
articles.content:
DFRK Sends Appeal to All Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) issued an "Appeal to All Koreans" on Sunday.
					 The full text of the appeal reads:
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad!
					
					 A grim situation on the eve of a war has been created on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces are staging mad-cap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle nuclear war exercises in the sky, land and sea with the involvement of huge U.S. aggression forces, south Korean puppet forces and ultra-modern nuclear war means amid the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK that have reached the height.
					
					 Due to the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' reckless provocation and war moves, the situation on the Korean Peninsula has gone beyond the controllable level and the worst physical conflict has now become unavoidable. 
					
					 Never has there been such a time as now when the Korean Peninsula has faced such a great danger of nuclear war.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation the army and people of the DPRK turned out in an all-out action to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 The all-out action represents a battle of justice for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers provoked the DPRK over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, pride and happiness of Koreans. This was an intolerable insult and hideous challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The provocation was a striking manifestation of the hostile policy toward the DPRK and a war act against it.
					
					 They assert that the DPRK is banned from launching satellite even though it is a right recognized by international law and that the DPRK is not entitled to have access to nukes even though they brandish nukes at their will. This is the height of brigandish action aimed to check the DPRK's advance for prosperity and force it to disarm in the end.
					
					 Words and truth do no work on the U.S., chieftain of aggression and war.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are full of the spirit of annihilating the enemies and are ready to counter the war of aggression with a great and just war for reunification of the country, and the provocation of a nuclear war with a stronger nuclear retaliatory strike. It is their unequivocal answer to the warmongers. This is also a final conclusion drawn by the DPRK in the century-old confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK has built invincible revolutionary strength, tightening their belts, under the great banner of Songun and finally emerged as a world-level space power and a nuclear weapons state. This was an expression of the national self-esteem based on the historical lesson.
					
					 The Korean nation has nobody to be afraid of in the world and no one in the world can provoke the nation.
					
					 The all-out action declared by the DPRK is a sacred and patriotic one for setting right the wrong world order by which injustice prevails over justice, and for fighting against the arch enemy.
					
					 In the final battle the DPRK will win national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, and lose only the military demarcation line.
					
					 All the Koreans should turn out in the patriotic nationwide action and fulfill their noble mission and historic responsibilities as a member of the nation.
					
					 All the Korean compatriots at home and abroad!
					
					 Today's all-out action is a showdown between all the Koreans and the U.S., one for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 There can be no separation between the north, the south and abroad and no distinction between ideology, ism, class, strata and age and sex in this sacred battle of the nation.
					
					 Now is the time for all those with the blood and soul of the Korean nation to unite as one and take part in a patriotic action to defend the destiny of the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans should strongly reject and foil the U.S. and pro-U.S. traitors' moves for a war of aggression.
					
					 Those in south Korea and different parts of the world should raise the flame of patriotic resistance against the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces, root cause of all misfortune and pains, should be driven out of south Korea and the cause of a war be removed as a whole.
					
					 The nation can neither be safe nor escape from a disaster of war as long as the pro-U.S. group of traitors is allowed to lord it over in south Korea.
					
					 All the Koreans should join the great and just war for national reunification and sweep away the pro-U.S. forces standing against reunification from south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is a symbol of the nation's sovereignty and dignity and a treasured sword for safeguarding the nation.
					
					 It is the immutable truth that a nation can not exist if it has no strength to protect itself. It is also a lesson taught by the tragic situation in which the jungle law prevails.
					
					 Aggressors are bereft of common senses and reason, and therefore, dialogue will never work on them who are utterly in disregard of international law.
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should be proud of the great Songun politics and the DPRK's nuclear deterrence that protect the nation, and fully support them.
					
					 The DPRK's sacred war of justice is sure to win a shining victory as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu who glorifies the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men, at the highest level.
					
					 Immense is the pride of the army and people under the leadership of the great brilliant commander and mounting high is their spirit.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces provoke even a bit the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, we will mercilessly wipe out the provokers and aggressors and achieve the final victory of national reunification at a breath.
					
					 All the Koreans will turn out in an all-people resistance, a just patriotic war for reunification to foil the south Korean puppet forces' reckless confrontation and war moves and thus build the most prosperous and powerful country on a reunified land of Korea.
					
					 We firmly believe that all the Koreans will positively respond to this patriotic and ardent appeal.
					
					 Final victory belongs to the Korean nation.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Returns Home from Peru, Cuba
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Returns Home from Peru, Cuba
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) came back home by train Sunday. It was led by Vice Chairman of its Central Committee Choe Han Chun. 
					 It took part in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in Peru and visited Cuba.

articles.title: Participants in National Meeting of Light Industrial Workers Visit Factories
articles.content:
Participants in National Meeting of Light Industrial Workers Visit Factories
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Participants in the national meeting of light industrial workers toured light industrial factories here.
					 They visited Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill. Being briefed on the shining history covered by the plant and the facts that the workers at the plant are performing innovations in the production of silk thread, they walked round the room dedicated to the history of the plant, room devoted to the education of people through revolutionary relics, lecture room for on-line college education, cabinet for general control, silk reeling shop, silk spinning shop, etc.
					
					 The visitors warmly congratulated the workers and technicians on their successes in updating the production processes of the plant, and exchanged experience with the innovators.
					
					 They toured the working sites, where the cultured ways in production and life were established, the fish breeding pond, sanatorium, etc.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory and others.
					
					 They looked round different production processes of the plants updated based on the cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Wartime Song Contest Held
articles.content:
Wartime Song Contest Held 
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A contest of singing wartime songs in chorus while marching in array took place at Kim Il Sung Square by students here on Sunday. 
					 More than 10 000 students from 14 universities including Kim Il Sung University and 11 districts including Mangyongdae, Pothonggang and Tongdaewon districts gathered at the square. 
					
					 They marched past the square, loudly singing songs on defending the leader and pledging revenges on the enemies and patriotic songs. 
					
					 Music played by the brass bands, footsteps of students and songs sang in chorus seemed to shake the square. 
					
					 Wartime songs including "Song of National Defence", "Advance" and "Song of Coast Artillerymen" touched the heartstrings of citizens. 
					
					 The contesters loudly sang such songs as "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "Death to U.S. Imperialist Aggressors". 
					
					 The contest fully demonstrated the revolutionary spirit of the young people of the DPRK determined to turn out in the sacred war of justice and achieve a final victory if they receive an order from the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Revolutionary Soldier Spirit Serves as Mental Weapon of DPRK Army, People: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Revolutionary Soldier Spirit Serves as Mental Weapon of DPRK Army, People: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a bylined article to the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Learning from the Revolutionary Soldier Spirit".
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit is a noble revolutionary spirit of the Korean People's Army which consists of the spirit of devotedly safeguarding the leader, the spirit of devotedly carrying out the leader's instructions and the heroic self-sacrificing spirit.
					
					 The work, a historic document, gave confidence in ever-victory to the army and people of the DPRK during the Arduous March and dealt a sledge-hammer blow at the imperialists. It serves as important guidelines to be held fast to in the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit is a powerful ideological and moral weapon for life and struggle of the army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The might of the spirit is that it is the death-defying spirit devoting youth and life to the party, leader, country and revolution and the revolutionary spirit of performing heroic feats overcoming all sorts of difficulties. 
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit is not simple combat spirit of the army, but the revolutionary spirit of the strongest elite army led by the great brilliant commander as well as the noble spirit for devotedly defending the leader. 
					
					 It is the guts and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK that no hardship will be insurmountable and no fortress be unconquerable as long as they struggle in the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					 The victory is certain for the DPRK in building a thriving nation as it has army and people strong in ideology and faith.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending Long Cycle of Tensions on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ending Long Cycle of Tensions on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The history of the partition of the Korean nation is an extension of the long cycle of the military provocations and tensions by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities as they have steadily increased the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined article on Sunday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation has lived being exposed to constant danger in which a war may break out any time due to the DPRK-targeted military provocative moves staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The war maniacs used to describe those military drills as "annual" and "defensive" to calm down public condemnation, but they can never cover up their ulterior intention.
					
					 The on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are the climax of their war provocations to ignite a war against the north and a prelude to the second Korean War.
					
					 The second Korean War has become an unavoidable thing, now that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime, barbarous provocateurs, push the situation to the extremity by resorting to the unprecedented "sanctions" against the DPRK and the war drills to invade the north, condemning the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch.
					
					 At last, time has come to put an end to the long cycle of the provocations and tensions which has lasted for a long time century after century.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime should not forget the confession made by a defeated American general that the Korean War was a big military disaster for the U.S. as it was a war fought against the wrong foe in a wrong place at a wrong time.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Call for "Additional Sanctions" on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Call for "Additional Sanctions" on DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A grave situation prevails on the Korean Peninsula where an accidental bullet may lead to a nuclear war due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises for invasion of the DPRK.
					 Like adding fuel to the flames, the Japanese reactionaries are busy, calling for "independent additional sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article observes in this regard:
					
					 In view of the present situation which is completely different from the past, the behavior of the Japanese reactionaries shows that they are going to use this opportunity for realizing the ambition for making Japan a military giant and launching overseas expansion. 
					
					 It would be a fatal mistake for Japan if it thinks it will be safe when a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula and when its "Self-Defense Forces" take part in the war. 
					
					 As they already declared, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will exercise the right to a preemptive nuclear attack to destroy the strongholds of the aggressors and to protect the supreme interests of the country if the U.S. ignites a nuclear war. 
					
					 Japan will never be of an exception as it watches for a chance for reinvasion of Korea after leaving the whole archipelagos to the mercy of the U.S. imperialists seeking aggression of the DPRK. 
					
					 This is not just a warning. 
					
					 It would be a serious misjudgment for Japan if it thinks as it lies beyond the sea it can survive the merciless strike of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries run amuck in collusion with the U.S., they will face the horrible strike, and the Korean people will vent their long pent-up grudge.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea launched the 162nd action for independent reunification and peace outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Mar. 12 to denounce the war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers against the north. 
					 Speakers at the rally said that the joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle involving huge armed forces are under way according to the operation plan aiming at "north occupation". 
					
					 In particular, the U.S. offensive F-22 Stealth fighters, B-52 strategic bombers, etc. are involved in the war exercises, escalating the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, they said. 
					
					 They denounced the south Korean warmongers for advertising the alliance with the U.S. for aggression as "partnership for prosperity". 
					
					 They demanded the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers stop at once the war exercises which would bring disasters to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Struggle against War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against War Called for in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A south Korean peace- reunification movement organization "Way of Reunification" held a regular meeting in Seoul on March 12 and adopted an action program for this year. 
					 Speakers at the meeting referred to the actions for peace and reunification conducted by the organization last year in solidarity with various other organizations.
					
					 They said that the organization will launch international grand march for peace in the U.S., Japan and other countries to mark the 60th anniversary of the signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement as an important work for this year. 
					
					 They said they would conduct no-war action for peace at the Rimjin Pavilion on July 27.

articles.title: Drug-related Crimes Rampant in S. Korea
articles.content:
Drug-related Crimes Rampant in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The number of reported drug crimes is increasing at an alarming rate in south Korea, according to south Korean Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation on Mar. 16.
					 According to available data from the police, drug-related criminals who were arrested over the last one year numbered more than 5 000.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Great Quake in Eastern Japan Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims of Great Quake in Eastern Japan Held
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A joint memorial service for the Korean victims of great earthquake in eastern Japan was held in the Korean primary and middle school in Tohoku, Miyagi Prefecture of Japan on Mar. 11 on the occasion of the second anniversary of the disaster.
					 Present at the event were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) who is concurrently chairman of its Rights and Welfare Committee, and the chairmen of the headquarters of the organization in the locality, and leading officials of each bodies under Chongryon, and bereaved families of Korean victims, and Korean quake sufferers, and other Koreans.
					
					 The participants observed a moment silence to the memory of the Korean victims.
					
					 Read out at the event was a memorial writing from the DPRK Committee for Overseas Koreans.
					
					 Ri Yong Sik, chairman of the Miyagi Prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, made a memorial address.
					
					 He said that leader Kim Jong Il was the first to send a message and money of sympathy to Koreans at a time when the whole of Japan was thrown into chaos by the largest-ever quake and tsunami.
					
					 The money associated by his love served as life-giving water that led the Chongryon organizations and Koreans in the disaster-stricken areas to the reconstruction and recovery, the speaker said, adding that they would always remember this love and care generation after generation.
					
					 He vowed to direct big efforts into providing the bereaved families and Koreans in the disaster-hit areas with stable life and make national character pervade the Koreans' community so as to let it prosper with mutual support and assistance under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The participants placed wreaths for the victims.

articles.title: DPRK's Sovereignty, Dignity Are Inviolable: International Community
articles.content:
DPRK's Sovereignty, Dignity Are Inviolable: International Community
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un is being greatly admired by the international community for leading the Korean people to victory upholding the banner of independence and Songun.
					 The chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea said a new history of Juche Korea is being ushered in by Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in ideology, leadership and personality.
					
					 The director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute said the Korean people are vigorously advancing the cause of building a thriving nation and national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary of the Political Council of the Nakhodka Branch of the United Russia Party said:  I keenly felt the greatness of Kim Jong Un. The DPRK's rapid progress is attributable to his energetic leadership.
					
					 The secretary of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle said:
					
					 It is admirable that the DPRK, not a big country, manufactured and launched satellites successfully with its own efforts and technology and this is possible only when the country and nation are led by a great leader.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo noted Kim Jong Un energetically led with a great success the whole course of manufacturing and launching the application satellite true to the behest of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said the U.S. and its allies threatened to impose sanctions and pressure on the DPRK over its nuclear test but inviolable are the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK led by Songun Commander Kim Jong Un, its supreme leader.
					
					 The head of Department of the Political Faculty University of Damascus in Syria stressed the Koreans would surely foil all sorts of provocations by the U.S. and its allies and always emerge victorious, rallied around him in single mind.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Benin
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin was formed in Cotonou to celebrate the 101st birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Ali Houdou, president of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to give wide publicity to his undying exploits on the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: DPRK Will Win under Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Un: British Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Will Win under Songun Leadership of Kim Jong Un: British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Mar. 9.
					 The statement pointed out that the Korean people would surely frustrate the U.S. stifling maneuvers and win a final victory thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 A few days ago, Kim Jong Un inspected the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and the Mu Islet Hero Defence Detachment. This area is a theatre of acute military showdown between socialism and imperialism and the forefront area where the Korean People's Army made strong retaliatory strike at the south Korean puppet forces for their provocation in the past.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's inspection of this most dangerous area in the world where the simmering tension has further coiled up due to the military drills for aggression Key Resolve and Foal Eagle was a thunderbolt that stroke terror into the hearts of the U.S. and south Korean forces.
					
					 His inspection reflected not only the stout spirit of the Koreans not to yield to any U.S. threat and blackmail but the firm will to achieve the national reunification if the enemies provoke a war.
					
					 It also instilled conviction of victory into the progressive mankind standing against imperialism.
					
					 He is a brilliant Songun commander who will bring about Korea's reunification, and the supreme commander of the anti-imperialist struggle.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in France
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in France
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee for the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed in Paris on Mar. 11.
					 Andre Aubry, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in praises of the President's revolutionary career and exploits in Paris and other cities from Mar. 11 to April 15.

articles.title: Committee for Marking Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Formed in Poland
articles.content:
Committee for Marking Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Formed in Poland
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Polish Preparatory Committee to Celebrate the Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Warszawa on Mar. 11.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including a seminar on exploits, celebration meeting, lecture and film show on the Day of the Sun and different other significant occasions.

articles.title: UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch for the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Mar. 7 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK "resolution on sanctions" adopted at the UN Security Council.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The "resolution on sanctions" is little short of the declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Quite just is the DPRK's nuclear test though the U.S. imperialists harshly criticize it. Had it not been for the "sanctions" by the UN against the DPRK, the nuclear test would not have been conducted.
					
					 The UNSC is an unequal, reactionary, deceptive and hypocritical apparatus.
					
					 The U.S. was the first to conduct its nuclear test and use nuclear weapon.
					
					 The UNSC, however, did not take issue with the U.S.
					
					 "Sanctions" are the wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 As the DPRK has the legitimate right to defend the country including the possession of nuclear deterrence, nobody can take issue with it.
					
					 The UNSC is being abused as a marionette of the U.S. and the trust in it keeps dropping as the days go by.
					
					 The UNSC "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is a product of the despicable plot to deter the DPRK from its economic development.
					
					 The UNSC is nothing but a shock brigade of the U.S. imperialists seeking to stifle the Juche-oriented socialist Korea centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The world progressives and anti-imperialist forces must turn out in the anti-U.S. struggle and positively support the DPRK, fortress of socialism.

articles.title: Russian Organizations Support DPRK's Principled Stand
articles.content:
Russian Organizations Support DPRK's Principled Stand
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia expressed full support for the statements issued by the spokesmen for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said on Mar. 9 as follows:
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. are not mere drills but high-handed provocations aimed to threaten and blackmail the peace-loving DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. makes desperate efforts to block the peaceful development of the DPRK which preserves its firm independent stand defying all sorts of economic blockade and pressure.
					
					 We fully support the independent and peaceful external and internal policy of the DPRK.
					
					 On the same day the National Salvation Front of Russia in its statement said: Such scientific and technological progress as satellite launch and success in the nuclear test is a brilliant fruition brought about by the line of self-reliance consistently maintained in the DPRK.
					
					 It was thanks to the self-reliance that the DPRK could not only solve the issues arising in latest science and technology by its own efforts but creditably defend its socialism, meeting all sorts of challenges by hostile forces.
					
					 The purpose sought by the U.S. in holding the joint military drills is to secure a pretext for invading the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite just countermeasure that the DPRK nullified the Korean Armistice Agreement under this condition.
					
					 As the political deterrence has now become defunct, only a powerful material strike is left to be dealt at provocateurs.

articles.title: Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Rehearsal Urged
articles.content:
Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Rehearsal Urged
						
 Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released its bulletin on Mar. 11.
					 The bulletin carried the full text of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and an article titled "Present situation on the Korean Peninsula".
					
					 The U.S. has staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the DPRK together with the south Korean puppet forces in the wake of prodding the UN Security Council to pass the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, while regarding it as a thorn in the flesh, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We express great concern over the grave situation prevailing in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. occupied the half of Korea in the mid-last century in a bid to ignite the Korean War and it has not yet implemented the resolution adopted at the 30th UN General Assembly on dismantling the "UN Command" in south Korea.
					
					 The issue of the Korean Peninsula should be settled by the Korean people themselves in a peaceful way.
					
					 The U.S. and its satellite forces should immediately stop their war maneuvers of aggression against the DPRK.
